name: Mt. Kleim Being
description:
Climbing the mythical Mount Kleim Being is the pinnacle of the adventurous spirit. Can you avoid unruly mountain goats, grumpy bears, and most of all, an uncooperative partner to conquer this majestic peak?

This game is a co-op multiplayer game where you and your climber partner try to scale Mt. Kleim Being. Avoid getting knocked down to your death, and use footholds to catch your breath.

Controls - 

Player 1: WASD to move. C to dash.

Player 2: Arrow keys to move. M to dash.
